amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the U.S. court system by $42 million and reduces funding for GSA by $43 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for salaries and expenses of Courts of Appeals, District Courts and Judicial Services by $42 million and to reduce funding for GSA rental of space under Real Property Activities, Federal Buildings Fund by $43 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Gosar.
